document_data.name: Rosemantle
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rosemantle''''' was a [[divine magic]] spell available to priests of [[Lathander]], the Morninglord. It increased a creature's resistance to adverse effects such as fear, nausea, pain, or sickness.
document_data.Effects: The caster had to touch the creature that was the target of this spell. When cast, the recipient of ''rosemantle'' gave off a soft glow resembling candlelight. For a short time (depending on the level of the caster), the target gained the blessing of increased resistance to fear (such as a ''[[fear]]'' spell or a [[dragon]]'s aura), sickness and nausea (such as the odor of a [[ghast]] or the moan of a [[cloaker]]), or pain (such as caused by ''[[Nybor's gentle reminder]]'').
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
